- town end boxing academy -

Welcome to ourAcademy

We are open to youth, young adult and adults wishing to get fit, feel better about them selves and learn to box. We are a community gym in barnsley!

start today

what seems impossible today
will soon become your warm-up

Our instructors actively participate in working with individuals and groups to improve their fitness and wellbeing. People of all ages are welcome, supported and guidance given to enable self improvement to attain a high standard.

meet ourStaff

We are appropriately qualified to teach and engage with people from all walks of life. There is a vibrant positive energetic atmosphere instilled by the instructor's who show that fun,determination and and a positive attitude are the key to success.

contact us

Daniel Baughpt

Daniel is passionate about delivering fun, effective workouts all while emphasizing safety and proper technique! The reward of sharing what he has learned and watching people transform their lives is what Daniel loves about being an instructor at Town End Boxing Academy.

andrzej sledzinski

Andrzej would like to pass on his Boxing knowledge to YOU! He wants to teach you the boxing techniques and the fitness routines of professionals alike. You dont have to have boxed before as all abilities are catered for.

check theTimetable

At Town End Boxing Academy we have a class for everyone. Our gym is a friendly place offering a fun atmosphere for people of all ages and fitness levels.
